title: oLLEdoLLEdu
sahitya:
oLLEdoLLEdu ella sthasaLava biTTu illi aDagidyA ballidatanave


caraNam 1    biDe biDano enna oDeya tirumala ninna uDiya pItAmbara piDidu sallisi kombe
    caraNam 2    eravu maravu mADi tirugisi enna koralige ninna caraNa kattikombe
    caraNam 3    atteya makkaLige tettiga nInAgi vittavittada rAshi tanditta pariyali
    caraNam 4    atta ittali nODinnetta pOgali ninna cittadali hattagaTTikombe
    caraNam 5    iruLu hagalu biDade guru purandaragolide aridu Enu iSTu purandara viTTalane
